message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $14,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to your needs and expectations, considering its value to you is $15,000. I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Alice, your offer is a good start, but I'm looking to get a better price.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering the value we both place on it.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that considers both the value you place on the item and my need to maximize the return on this investment. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.
